Modules
Each correction, enhancement or effect is implemented as modules, and this section includes documentation of each module and it's specific parameters. A module consists of an expander bar where the icon is used to turn then module on or off, then there are a title of the module press this to expand the module too see the paramters userinterface. icon is the preset icon to access the available presets stored for the modul and icon is used to reset the module paramaters to theire default values.
Presets
Presets are stored configurations for the module parameters both internal and userdefined is available thru clicking the icon and a list of available presets are shown for your choice, the activ preset is in bold text.
The preset system does also support automatic preset selection based on image data such as exposure time, camera model and much more fields.
Creating a new preset
